Package com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.discovery.v1.model.configuration

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ConfigurationManager
    Interface defining the constants and methods associated with Configurations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    A Configuration is used to define how a Document will be ingested.
    ContentSelector
    ContentSelector allows you to define an xPath to retrieve content from an XML document.
    Conversions
    Conversions define the steps associated with various filetypes.
    CreateConfigurationRequest
    Request to create a Configuration.
    CreateConfigurationRequest.Builder  
    CreateConfigurationResponse
    Response from CreateConfigurationRequest.
    DeleteConfigurationRequest
    Request to delete a Configuration.
    DeleteConfigurationRequest.Builder  
    DeleteConfigurationResponse
    Response from a DeleteConfigurationRequest.
    Enrichment
    An Enrichment contains configuration pertaining to which fields Watson should extract metadata from.
    FontSetting
    Contains basic settings for a font.
    FontStyles
    Contains basic styles for a font.
    GetConfigurationRequest
    Request to get a single Configuration.
    GetConfigurationRequest.Builder  
    GetConfigurationResponse
    Response from GetConfigurationRequest.
    GetConfigurationsRequest
    Request to get a list of Configurations.
    GetConfigurationsRequest.Builder  
    GetConfigurationsResponse
    Response from GetConfigurationsRequest.
    Heading
    Heading settings in a PDF or Word document.
    Html
    Configuration options for an HTML document.
    NormalizationOperation
    Configuration options for a JSON document.
    Pdf
    Configuration options for a PDF document.
    UpdateConfigurationRequest
    Request to update a Configuration.
    UpdateConfigurationRequest.Builder  
    UpdateConfigurationResponse
    Response from UpdateConfigurationRequest.
    Word
    Configuration options for a Microsoft Word document.
